subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin turned a lap of 187.380 miles per hour to edge Ryan Newman and win the pole for the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Atlanta Motor Speedway.
snippet: Denny Hamlin turned a lap of 187.380 miles per hour to edge Ryan Newman and win the pole for the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Atlanta Motor Speedway.
